MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the L11 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Elderberry Close, Milland Close and surrounding streets. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7.30PM due to further repairs required to an underground cable fault. Our engineers will be connecting a generator to the mains supply in order to carry out repair work safely on the underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property, there may also be a brief interruption later on this evening when they remove the generator to connect back onto main supply. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 9.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.18PM on 16th October 2020.
